inn1.comm: loosener just outside off and softly played away to the off side
fullish outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off
drifts on the pads and he clips it away towards midwicket
left alone outside the off stump, Mashrafe not bowling at peak speed yet
gives him width and he shapes to cut but ends up chopping it to cover
on the body and gently clipped away down to fine leg, the fielder dives and stops it
fullish in length outside off and he safely leaves it alone
similar delivery shaping away from the right-hander but Sachin is happy to leave it
that's a brilliant drive, meaty half volley outside the off stump and he has to lean forward a long way to caress that past the covers
that's a good comeback. pitched up and he has Sachin poking at it, nearly shaved the face of the bat
brings it back inwards and he watchfully leaves it alone
full and swinging in and he clips it across the line but can't beat square leg
drops it with soft hands towards point and sets off quickly, Tendulkar was quicker
short and wide and he has to reach out and ends up slapping it wide of short cover, poor delivery really
this one nips back in and Tendulkar stays back at the crease and pushes it down the track
punched back to the bowler and it's a front-foot no-ball, free hit coming up..
Free Hit: And Tendulkar fails to put away this short one, quite a steep bouncer and too much for the batsman as he tried to upper cut, had a glance at the umpire
short of a length and he turns it down to midwicket
punches it square but cannot beat point
swings it inwards and he gets forward and clips it down to mid-on
drops it with soft hands down towards point and they hurry the single
wide down the leg side and Mushfiqur is alert to catch that as the ball suddenly moved to his right
stays back at the crease and knocks it back to the bowler, didn't move his feet much
drives a bit away from the body, swings late and it's full and he can't beat cover
this one comes back inwards and had the batsman in a bit of a tangle, he managed to clip it away to the on side
nicely punched off the back foot down to mid-off
stays back at the crease and punches it down towards short cover
drifts onto the pads and he uppishly clips it down to deep square leg
gets half forward and softly pushes it to the off side
nips this one back in and he clips it down to the on side, moving his feet well
wide again and he pounces on this one, had to reach out and yet managed to slice it well and wide of Nasir at backward point
tempts him with another wide one but gets away with it as Tendulkar reaches out, slashes and misses, close to being a wide
crisp cut! Good length wide of the off stump and he goes back and slices it well wide of point, pure timing
closer to the off stump and he pats it down to the off side
big slash! Quicker delivery and more bounce, wide as well and he wanted to slash that away but missed it completely
drifts on the pads and he neatly clips it behind square on the on side, fielder runs across and mops up at the edge of the boundary
inside edge! Shafiul angles it across the left-hander, Gambhir stays rooted to the crease and tries to drive and gets a thick inside edge that thuds onto the stumps, lack of foot movement the cause
big appeal for an lbw and that looked close! Nips this back in sharply and hits his back leg on the drive, perhaps that was too high, need to see another replay
good length on the off stump and tucked towards midwicket
nicely driven square but straight to point
it's all boundaries for Tendulkar, good length on the off stump, enough width for him to punch it in front of square and beat the diving cover fielder
seemed a bit slower and for a change he just gets a single, pushed down to square third man
gets well forward and defends to the off side
if you bowl it on the pads to Kohli then forget about it, turns the face of the bat and whips it away behind square, no chance for the fielder in the deep
full and in the slow to drive straighter but he turned the face of the bat and knocked it towards mid-on
brings it inwards and Tendulkar tucks it to square leg and it's a good effort by Nazimuddin to slide and cut it off, they take a single though
pushes it softly to the off side
tries to angle it wide of point but places it straight to the fielder
slower ball and fuller and he checks his drive back to the bowler
lovely drive off the front foot, full and angling in on the off stump and he shows the full face and bisects the gap between cover and mid-off
just drifts wide of the leg stump
comes forward and pushes it to mid-off and jogs the single
gets well forward and drives firmly towards long-off
stays on the back foot and punches it to short cover
gets well forward and drives to mid-off
clipped wide of square leg and he takes the first run quickly but decides against the second
he's in the best touch we've seen after a long time, half volley outside the off stump and he leans forward and dismisses it wide of extra cover
drifts down the leg side and he clips him down to fine leg
he stays beside the line and knocks it towards cover point
angles it from wide of the crease and he opens the face and dabs it to third man
nicely punched off the front foot but straight to short cover
half volley on the pads and he eases it behind square on the on side, there's protection in the deep
bangs it in short down the leg side and he ducks, wide called
drifts on the pads and he stays on the backfoot and clips it away to fine leg, can't take the second
once again Kohli very easily tucks it behind square, easy paced pitch to play that shot
didn't come on to the bat very quickly but he was prepared to wait, rock back and cut to third man
tucked off the hips and he hurries the run
defended down the pitch off the full face of the bat, solidly done
you should have seen that speed away! Full on the pads and clipped away with little effort, raced past square leg and bisected the gap between two fielders in the deep
tossed up outside off and he punches it to the off side
comes quite slowly onto the bat and he shuffles and clips it to the leg side
quicker and flatter and he punches it hard down the pitch
pushes it with the angle down to long-off
quicker one and Tendulkar read the length a bit late, managed to push it to the off side
slower through the air, softly knocked to the on side
bowls it a bit short and Kohli is hurried onto the shot, pulls but keeps it down
short one again and pulled to the same fielder at midwicket, seemed like an action replay
drifts on the pads and he clips him down to fine leg
excellent running, he drops it with soft hands down towards cover point and sets off
once again another solid punch to the off side, no runs but pleasing to watch that hit the middle of the bat
he oversteps and bowls it short, Kohli swivels and pulls down to fine leg
Free Hit: I don;t know why Tendulkar has this luck with a free hit, but credit to the bowler, fast yorker outside the off stump, he tries in vain to squeeze it out
fullish on the off stump and he drives to mid-off
flatter delivery and he gets forward and defends
gets well forward and drives a full delivery to long-off
came a bit too forward there, managed to squeeze it out
quicker and drifting on the pads, hits his leg and rolls to the on side
punched towards cover and he sets off but is sent back
gets away with a half volley as it's driven straight to short extra cover, good balance from Kohli
persists with that short delivery and he swivels and pulls to midwicket again, something's got to give..
angles it towards off and middle and he uses his wrists well to clip it to deep square leg, his signature shot
tries the short one to Tendulkar who just about manages to fend it off his glove behind the keeper
fullish on the middle stump and he gently eases it down to fine leg
short and wide outside the off stump, on this easy paced pitch he stays back and doesn't hit it too hard, places it wide of backward point
full and wide outside off and driven to extra cover
drifts to the leg stump and he clips it to the leg side
skids through, hits the pads and sneaks past the off stump
gets forward and drives to the off side
flatter and angling in on the middle stump, he tucks it to the on side
down the leg side and he's on his knee and tries to paddle it away, misses it
gets forward and pushes it to long-on
softly patted to the off side
quicker delivery and he drives to the off side
been ages since we've seen that from him! Tossed up on middle and leg and he clears the front leg and carts it over wide long-on
sweeps firmly and he finds deep square leg
fullish on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
gets on the front foot and clips it to midwicket
makes room and he knocks it down to mid-off
makes a bit of room and drives him down to long-off
pushes it back to the bowler but plays it late and close to the pads, had the keeper a bit excited
a few paces down the pitch but checks the drive
tossed up on middle and leg and after a big shuffle he clips it to the leg side
makes room again but ends up driving back to the bowler
drifts down the leg side and he gets on his knee and sweeps and places it wide of short fine leg
another sweep and it's fine but it' down to short fine leg
a fifty finally for Tendulkar! He made room to a flighted delivery and lofted him inside out over extra cover, a better effort was needed at the boundary
stumping appeal but he's safe, Tendulkar managed to drag his back foot back in time before Rahim whipped off the bails, the third umpire takes a look
flatter delivery and he punched it down to long-on
gets forward and steers it towards point
drifts down the leg side, can't nudge it away
flatter delivery and he pushes it with the angle to long-on
makes room and he pushes it to the off side
clips it towards short fine leg and challenges the fielder, well run
comes to the pitch of the ball and drives to long-off
neatly punched  but straight to extra cover
goes back at the crease and punches it to long-on
goes back and across and clips it easily down to square leg for an easy single
stands outside leg, exposes his stumps and drives it to long-off
goes back and punches it towards long-on and runs the first quickly
once again Kohli makes room for the expansive drive, another single to long-off
Tendulkar doesn't make as much room but he manages to place it to the same fielder at long-off, jogs the single
tossed up outside off and he tucks it to midwicket
plays it a bit late, waits for it to turn before dabbing it wide of short third man
this time it keeps a bit low and he just misses it, skids through and lands on Rahim's gloves
gets forward and drives on the up to deep extra cover
gets on the front foot and drives him towards point
ordinary fielding at the boundary but don;t take anything away from the shot, stays back and punched it crisply past extra cover, pure timing
tries to dab it wide of short third man
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward and pushes it with soft hands again down the track
stays back and clips him down to deep square
once again solidly driven but back to the bowler
flighted down the leg side and clipped away
comes well forward and pushes it down to long-off
quicker and flatter and he's confident of getting on his knee and sweeping just wide of short fine leg
exposes his stumps, keeps a bit low but he manages to clip it away
takes a few paces down the track and clips it to the leg side, the spinners are hardly troubling him
driven on the up and just wide of short cover, would have been a blinder
flatter delivery and he stays back and clips it to midwicket
plays an expansive drive past the cover, places it wide of the sweeper to pick up a second run
tosses it up a bit more and he checks his drive to the off side
gets well forward and drives towards mid-off
comes on to the bat slowly, he stays back, waits and steers it to the off side
on the pads and clipped away down to fine leg
tossed up outside off and pushed wide of point
punches it straight back to the bowler
he risks the sweep again because he plays it right in front of the stumps, manages to get quite a bit of bat on it, places it to short fine leg
he leans forward and chips it in the air over extra cover but right in the gap, he knows where the fielders are
comes forward, turns the face of the bat and jogs a single to the leg side

bowls it flat and short and he rocks back and pulls firmly to the leg side, transfers his weight to the backfoot, Shafiul dives at fine leg and injures his shoulder, the physio comes out and he's off the field
tossed up on middle and leg and pushed down to long-on
fires that on the blockhole and he manages to jam it out to point
shuffles and clips it to the leg side
starts off a new spell by drifting on the body, easily clips it to the leg side
fullish outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off
full delivery and driven again but straight to extra cover
tucks him up for room and he can only punch it back to the bowler
full on middle and leg and pushed down to long-on
full on the pads and worked away down to long-on, another easy single
goes back at the crease and punches it to the on side
goes back and clips it wide of midwicket
shuffles far across his stumps and clips him to the leg side, he's not afraid to expose his stumps
gets to his fifty with a firm push down to long-off
easily works it down to deep midwicket
goes back and clips him down to  square leg, no pressure being created on these two batsmen
a solid punch off the front foot and straight to short extra cover, Kohli has been equally flawless today
gets beside the line and plays it with soft hands to the off side
drives towards extra cover, didn't time it well enough and risks a single to Shakib, his throw was wide
he punishes a long hop, on this pitch Kohli had enough time to swivel and pull wide of midwicket, no chance for the fielder at the deep
comes forward and pushes it towards point
fuller delivery and he pushes this down to long-on
flatter delivery, stays back and thumps it to sweeper cover
flatter delivery and he punches it to long-off, jogs the single
goes back at the crease and pushes it to cover
gets forward and drives to cover again, tries to squeeze it past the gap
driven to cover again! Action replay
stays back and clips it to the leg side, better luck this time as he gets a single
hones in on middle and leg and he shuffles and clips it towards fine leg
punched off the back foot wide of the bowler, down to long-off
fullish on the off stump and he gets forward and drives wide of cover
seemed risky at first! Wide outside off but he knew there was no slip, dabbed it down to third man
a half volley outside the off stump, drives straight to cover
gets forward and checks his drive to long-on
he opens the face of the bat and punches it down to deep point
gets across and drives it to straight to mid-ff
nicely played, a bit shorter and he weaves backwards and deftly dabs it down to third man
drifts on the pads and he clips it softly towards midwicket
short delivery and Kohli can't resist the pull, manages to keep it down to midwicket
taps it down towards mid-off and refuses the single
pushed to Shakib at mid-off again and this time he has to scamper back, sign of nerves finally?
clipped hard down to mid-on and he can't pinch a single here
slashed and just short of point! Nervy moment for Sachin, well stopped in the end
gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
and it's a maiden! Clipped hard to mid-on, he's trying to get it away but can't pinch the single
we might as well rerun the tapes, another short ball from Shahadat is pulled by Kohli to midwicket
stays back and punches it to mid-on, no run again, the Fevicol Effect
bangs it in short and he pulls and it drops short of deep backward square leg, managed to keep it down, just
nicely driven off the front foot but it fails to beat mid-off....
in the air wide of midwicket and very safely played in the end! Should ease the nerves considerably, worked his wrists well and places it wide of the fielders
punched towards mid-off, thinks of a single but decides against
makes room and scoops it over cover point, the fielder gives chase
stays back and punches it hard down to long-on for a single
leading edge! Managed to get his bat behind on time
gets on his knee and paddles it down to fine leg
inside edge! Loose shot from Kohli, it was a flatter delivery and Kohli made room to drive and ended up getting an inside edge to the base of the leg stump
stays back and clips it wide of mid-on
stays back and punches it to long-on for a single
drifts on the body and he clips it away down towards deep square leg
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls to short fine leg
that's a cracking drive! Full and wide on the off stump and he bisected the big gap between mid-off and cover, the fielders barely moved
swivels to pull but the ball clips his legs and rolls to the leg side
goes back and punches it towards long-off
flatter delivery and he clips him straight to midwicket
fuller delivery and driven down to long-on
flatter delivery and he eases a single to long-on, calmly done
punches it to extra cover and the fielder dives but they decide against the single
the slider, he goes on his knee to sweep but the ball clips his back leg, big appeal for an LBW but Reiffell isn't convinced
down the leg side and he heaves at it and misses
punches it just wide of mid-off and takes a quick single
careful Sachin! He walked down the pitch to squeeze it into a gap on the off side, he jogs out of the crease and then scampers back and had it been a direct hit he could have gone
pushes it to the off side and jogs out of his crease again but he's sent back, phew
short and wide and he punches it wide of extra cover, he's into the 90s now
full on middle and leg and he squeezes it out to deep square leg
makes a bit of room and he lofts over midwicket, the fielder nearly over-runs the ball near the boundary
four more! He makes room and lofts over extra cover, the field's up and it's a safe shot
shuffles and clips it to the on side
drifts down the leg side and he nearly gets a tickle
floated down the leg side and he tucks it to the on side, 95 now
flatter delivery on the pads and he clips it on the full to short fine leg
floated down the leg side and he sweeps but misses
chips down the track and clips a low full toss down to short midwicket
floated down the leg side again, when is this over going to end?
flater delivery on the pads and he clips him wide of square leg
no turn at all, he stays on the back foot and punches it to mid-off, fumble and they run the single
gets forward and pushes it late to mid-on, 97 now
flatter delivery on the pads and he tries to pull but the ball clips his pads and rolls away, close tro a lbw
he risks staying back at the crease and clips it, very close to the pads
more flight this time and he goes to 98 with a gentle clip to the leg side, he retains the strike too
tossed up on middle and off and pushed down to mid-off
uses his feet and he can only drive back to the bowler
shuffles and tries to steal a single to the on side, Rahim rushes and stops it
goes to 99 with a gentle push to long-off, just one run away
flatter delivery and it skids through and it settles on the keeper's gloves
full outside off and driven down to long-off and he will retain the strike
sweeps to short fine leg but they refuse the single
take that! Raina's favourite slog, tossed up and he whacks it with the turn to deep midwicket
quick full toss and he picks it away to deep square leg
the zillionth wide down the leg side, fails to sweep it away again
fullish in length and driven to long-off
and nope! Will have to wait, clipped straight to midwicket
he can only softly punch it to short extra cover, mid-off had gone back, the wait continues...
and meanwhile Raina gets a move on, a low full toss down the leg side and he paddles it down to fine leg
gets on his knee and slogs him straight to midwicket
punched o long-off and he's off the strike

and he's finally done it! Clips it  down to square leg and jogs the single, very subdued celebration, he must be mightily relieved but he's not showing it, removes his helmet, the Bangladesh fie;lder congratulate him, 100 international centuries - we may never see it emulated, well done Sachin! Take a bow
driven uppishly to long-off for a single
he takes authority finally! Short delivery and he swivels and pulls it down to deep midwicket, looked like a tired shot
attempted yorker but it's a low full toss, he backs away and scoops it over backward point, beats the fielder
makes room and he squirts it out towards cover
backs away and lofts him down to long-on, Tendulkar back on strike
he tries to paddle a delivery from outside the off stump to the leg side, then changes his mind and squeezes it to the off side
bangs it in short and Raina stays back at the crease and hoicks this one over deep midwicket, typical Raina
stays back at the crease and pulls hard down to deep midwicket
chips down the track and lofts inside out over extra cover, picked the gap and four more
makes room and eases a full delivery to sweeper cover
chips down the track and he lofts inside out down to long-off, almost found the gap
plants his front foot forward and he scoops it over extra cover, he "quietly" moves to 49
punches a full delivery to long-on and that;s his fifty
fires it full outside the off stump and he makes room and he fails to connect
Tendulkar backs away and realises it's a slower ball, he adjusts his shot and dabs it to third man
that's an excellent catch in the deep! Raina makes room and tries to launch it over long-off, Tamim jogs back and cups it over his head and falls just in front of the rope
Standing ovation for Sachin! Slower ball, he makes room to drive but gets the thickest of edges to the keeper, he walks back slowly, tired but probably more so relieved, the crowd's on their feet
not to be...he opens the face of the bat and dabs it down towards third man
full and wide and he fails to make contact
low full toss outside the off stump and he pushes it wide of point, made too much room
squeezes it out to the off side for a single
low full toss outside the off stump and well, it;s only a couple to sweeper cover
slower ball outside off and he thumps it to the off side
another short ball and he mistimes the pull to deep midwicket, the boundaries aren't coming
driven firmly to Sunny at extra cover and he had all the time to throw at the bowler's end, missed it completely

that's followed by some brilliant fielding! Dhoni flicks it to the deep on the on side and he pushes for the second, Rohit's struggling and Nasir's throw is accurate, direct hit and it looked quite clear at normal speed, the third umpire takes a look
slower ball, swings and misses, the struggle for boundaries continue
forces it down the ground to long-off, just 11 runs off the last 2.4 overs
slower ball on the pads and he clips him down towards midwicket
not enough pace on the ball to work it away, he clips it wide of midwicket but does well to pick up two
Dhoni moves across to pull a short one and gets a top edge that lands safely between two converging at midwicket
too full and wide outside the off stump and it's too wide for him to chase it
short and pulled and it nearly carries to Shakib at deep midwicket, he decides to stop it instead of going for the catch
makes a lot of room and ends up drilling it down the ground to long-on, hurries the second run
Shahadat hands out a freebie, friendly full toss outside the off stump and he thumps it past midwicket, races away for four
a slower ball and short, he swivels and pulls and clears square leg, the fielder in the deep runs across and cuts it off
the last over overshadows the good work by Bangladesh in the last few overs, length ball outside off and Dhoni whacks it down to long-on, the fielder slides but can't cut it off

inn2.comm: Tamim didn't really want to play at it but the ball followed the wood like a magnet, outside edge to third man
wide outside the off stump and he reaches out and chops it to third man
lands it outside the off stump and he gets some movement off the pitch, left alone
fullish in length outside the off stump, he reaches out and drills it back to the bowler
nips away from him and he defends this one to cover
opens the face of the bat and glides it to third man
lands it outside off and gets it to shape away, he leaves it alone
swish and a miss! Late movement from Pathan beats the drive
flashy drive outside off and he gets a thick outside edge which flies to third man
late inward movement and he clips it with the angle to fine leg
swings it in and he clips it just wide of mid-on
Class! Bangladesh need more of those, full and swinging away, Tamim retains his balance and caresses it past cover point, lovely follow through, stand and deliver, did you see that Sourav?
appeal for an lbw but that was missing leg, he got it to nip back in, Nazimuddin trapped at the crease
stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
trapped at the crease and he gets an inside edge to the pads, Praveen keeps it straight
keeps it straight and he shuffles and clips it towards mid-on
thick outside edge and it flies past first slip who was a bit wide, third man picks up
short and shaping away and he timed the punch well but couldn't beat cover point, good stop
stays on the back foot and he punches it to mid-off
punched towards cover point and Raina slides and misfields, Kohli runs across and cuts it off
full on the pads and clipped away down to fine leg
gets across and punches it down to mid-off
fullish and swinging in, he gets an inside edge to the leg side
drifts on the pads and he clips it away behind square leg
drifts on the body and he clips it easily down to fine leg
full on the off stump and thumped down towards mid-off, Bangladesh need to pick up the quick singles like Gambhir does so often
once again, looking  to whip it past the infield but he can only find midwicket
terrible shot! Nazimuddin tries to force the boundary by stepping down the pitch, he tries to pull over midwicket, top edge swirls to Rohit at short extra cover
pushes it towards cover point
drifts on the pads and he fails to clip it away with the bat, hits his pads and rolls away
a bit too straight, he tucks it down to midwicket
full on the stumps and firmly driven but straight to mid-on, timed it well
that's the shot Tamim was looking for! Too straight on middle and leg and he merely punches it through the line with the full face of the bat and beats mid-on
gets across and clips it down the ttack
nice elegant punch on bended knee but straight to point, he's timing them well
thick inside edge onto the body and the ball rolls to the off side
aims for the square drive but mistimes it to the off side
Jahurul owes Tamim four runs here! Gets in the way of a crisp straight drive, it was travelling quickly
short of a length outside off, he defends it to the off side
gets beside the line and taps it softly to the off side
slower delivery, he gets across and defends back to the bowler
lovely flick! Too straight by Praveen, turns at the crease, rolls his wrists and tucks it wide of square leg
good start by Dinda, on the off stump and he stays back and defends down the track
on the off stump and he gets across and punches it to the off side
tries to squeeze a single to the covers but Kohli's alert at cover point
keeps it straight and tucks him up for room, softly defended to the off side
driven uppishly towards point but well short of Kohli
punched towards mid-off on the walk, can't rotate the strike yet
nicely driven down the pitch back to the bowler
he'll get more than a single for that, shuffles and turns the face of the bat and times the flick well past midwicket
Jahurul forces it away, fetches it from the off stump and flays it away wide of midwicket, should release the pressure on Jahurul
opens the face of the at at the last minute and dabs it to third man, good stop by Irfan
slower delivery and he punches it towards cover
this one seams  away from the left-hander, he pokes at it and nearly edges it
goes back at the crease and pushes it back to the bowler
another stylish punch finds the fielder on the off side, cover this time
drifts on the body and he clips him down to midwicket
over mid-on and fully in control of that, stays at the crease to a pitched up delivery and scoops it high over the fielder
low full toss and he pushes it to long-on
punches it to long-off
clips it to square leg and heads back to the crease
the lap shot, gets well across his stumps and scoops it down to fine leg
flighted on the middle stump and he tucks it to short square leg
goes back and punches it back to the bowler
punched off the back foot and very well fielded by Jadeja at short point
goes back and punches it well wide of point
shuffles at the crease and tucks it down to short fine leg
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped for a single
pushed back to the bowler
gets well forward and defends
clipped off the pads to the leg side and Raina was appealing for the leg before, Dhoni was concentrating on the run-out, a direct hit would have sent back Islam
goes back and punches it to long-off
tossed up on the pads and clipped wide of square leg, it travelled quickly
turns it to square leg for a single
just manages to clear it! He chips down the track and lofts him and just beats Irfan's reach at wide long-on
punches it to long-on
clips it to the on side
gets forward and pushes it towards cover
worked to the on side for a single
clips it behind square
plonks forward and defends
turns it to midwicket for a single
nice tight bowling, gets forward and defends
brings up the fifty stand with a single to long-off, just beats the fielder
fullish in length on the of stump and he clips it to the on side
another solid punch but straight to the fielder at mid-off
sweetly timed punch in front of square on the off side, sweeper cover picks it up
bangs it in short and he weaves out of the way
swivels to pull and the ball hits his arm and rolls to third man, good bouncer from Dinda
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man for a single
nicely played, opened the face of the bat and angled it down to third man
angled down to third man again, fully along the turf this time
bangs it in short and he swerves out of the bouncer, he was surprised by the bounce
stays back at the crease and defends back to the bowler
stays beside the line and angles it towards point
solidly defended on the back foot down the pitch
back of a length, Dinda's stock delivery, dabbed down to third man
short of a good length again, he gets around it to work in front of square leg
he gets predictable with that shortish length, Tamim stays in the crease, swivels and dispatches the pull forcingly between midwicket and mid on
point saves the boundary, Dinda goes fuller, Tamim waits and slaps it to point's right, who dives to stop the ball
bouncer into the body, he gets outside the line and cracks the pull to fine leg
steered to third man
nearly gives his wicket away, tries to angle it down to third man and misses
drops it short and he plays a short-arm pull down to deep square leg
punches it towards long-on and jogs the single
stays back at the crease and defends towards mid-off
punches it with soft hands in front of mid-off and calls early, bangladesh need to keep pushing for these runs
drifts on the pads and he clips it towards square leg, well stopped
tossed up on the pads and clipped down to square leg
comes round the wicket, gets across and clips it towards square leg
gets forward and steers it to the off side
sharp turn and the ball hits him high on the pads, encouragement for Ashwin
comes well forward and defends
Ashwin keeps him quiet again as he gets well forward to defend
bowls it flat, Tamim can only defend it
stays back and punches it down the pitch
flatter delivery and Tamim makes room to cut and he nearly edged it, Dhoni couldn't catch it anyway
gets an inside edge onto his pads
flatter delivery, he gets forward and defend
uses his feet and pushes it to the on side
pushes it down to cover point
drifts down the leg side and Jahurul was quick to the task, on his knee and sweeps wide of Tiwary at short fine leg
another sweep and Tamim risks the single to Tiwary, the throw was wide
lunges forward and defends down the track
gets well forward and he gets an inside edge to the on side
stays back and punches it towards mid-on
makes room and punches it hard but can't beat extra cover
gets forward and pushes it down to long-off
nudges it wide of square leg for a single
tossed up middle and leg and he clips it to short fine leg, nice tight stuff
quick single take to cover, he has to hurry for the single
straightens, he knocks it back to the bowler
worked wide of midwicket
the carrom ball has him in a tangle, beats him and the off stump all ends up
dabs it just wide Jadeja at short third man
lunges well forward and defends to the off side
gets forward and clips it wide of square leg
tucked to short fine leg and they have to hurry the single
goes back at the crease and pushes it down to long-on
that's cleverly played! He bowls it quicker from round the wicket, Jahurul makes room and deliberately slices it on the up wide of short third man
comes well forward and defends
goes back and punches it back to the bowler
makes room and cuts wide of gully and that;s his fifty!
he was all over that one, turned back in and clipped his pad as he tried to work it away
gets across and clips it wide of square leg
waits for the turn and clips it to the on side
classy Tamim again! He makes a bit of room, charges down the track, bends his knee and lofts inside out over cover, wide of the fielder
pushes it down to long-off for a single
tucked to the on side for another quick single
shuffles and clips it behind square for a single and that's his fifty!
driven past Raina for a single, crowd's getting more vocal
clipped on the up just wide of a diving midwicket fielder for a single
driven down to long-on
pushes it just wide of Ashwin's reach and down to long-on
the turn nearly squared him up, he chipped down the track to loft and got an inside edge to the on side
goes back and punches it back to the bowler
Tamim risks making room to the quicker one skidding to the stumps, manages to slice it but straight to point
Ashwin pauses before delivery, Tamim lunges forward and drives
rocks back and slaps it but can't beat sweeper cover
greets Jadeja with a spanking reverse sweep! In position early for the shot, fetched it from the leg stump and bashed it past deep point
down the leg side and there's an appeal for a stumping, Tamim managed to drag his foot back, third umpire takes a look
comes well forward and tucks it to the leg side
chips down the track and pushes it down to long-off

the bowling change works! Jahurul gave it away here, he tried to hoick it over the on side after fetching it from outside the off stump, ends up hitting it flat to Rohit at midwicket, he trudges off slowly
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
comes round the wicket, he tucks it to the on side
outside off and he angles it wide of third man
take that! Wide outside the off stump and Nasir thumps it wide of backward point, third man had no chance of getting around
much better, he stays back at the crease and defends
the leg cutter, Nasir stays back at the crease and softly taps it down the track
good comeback after the boundary, tucks him up for room as he pushes it back softly back to the bowler
sweeps but can't beat shirt fine leg
defends close to the pads and Dhoni gets excited and appeals
responds with a slog! Flights it on middle and leg and he gets on his knee and biffs it over midwicket
gets well forward and defends
stays right back at the crease and punches it back down the pitch
the legcutter from round the wicket, clips his pads and rolls to the on side, Praveen appeals, that could have been missing leg, just
tucked away to the leg side for a quick single
slower ball and he taps it to the off side, strides out of the crease and heads back
well played! Praveen drops it on a friendly length, Nasir stays at the crease and pounds it over midwicket, one bounce and four
short and wide and he reaches out and cuts but can't beat point
good improvisation! Length ball and he angles it down to third man, Irfan mops up
goes for the slog but doesn't control it, the fielder picks up at deep midwicket
makes room and steers it to Praveen at point
tossed up on middle and leg and worked down to mid-on
clipped to short fine leg and Tamim has to hurry, the throw was wide
steers it down to point for a single
Dropped: Tough one for Dhoni, the slower ball, Nasir slashes and gets an outsode edge that evades Dhoni's glove by a few inches, bonus runs for Bangladesh
slower ball and he punches it back to the bowler
gets a bit of width and he chops it down to backward point
angles it inwards and Nasir shuffles and clips it wide of square leg

this should come as a relief for India! The well-set Tamim departs, Praveen lands a length ball wide of the off stump, he rocks back and cuts on the up and Jadeja times his dive well to his right and picks it up inches from the ground at backward point
he bends it back in and nearly induces an inside edge onto the stumps, close call
excellent running, pushed to the off side and they push hard for the second
tucked off the pads to the on side
drifts back in and he manages to clip it to midwicket
skids back in sharply and he clips it to square leg
another skiddy delivery and he plays it with soft hands
flatter delivery and he places it to sweeper cover
goes back and slaps it to the off side
drives just wide of cover fora single
Ashwin pauses again before delivery, Shakib goes back and clips it towards midwicket
he drives it down to long-on
tries to slog him but gets an inside edge onto the boot
fullish in length and drilled to mid-off, that should have been put away
it's a front foot no-ball! Shakib makes room and ends up chopping it to mid-off
Free Hit: Shakib stays at the crease, clears his front leg, fetches that from middle and slogs it over midwicket, clean hit
chance for India! Shakib tried to clear long-on but Ashwin wasn't quick enough to run back from mid-on and catch it, he managed to pull it back though
he makes room and ends up chopping it towards Dhoni
looking dangerous! A friendly length ball on off and middle and Shakib smotes it over deep midwicket, Dinda getting his length all wrong
18 off the over! Shakib makes room and slashes and gets a outside edge that flies past the keeper, no slips and no chance for third man either
drifts on the pads and he clips it to the on side
he drops it a fraction short and Shakib rocks back and absolutely slaps that past cover, raw power indeed
fuller delivery and he drives towards cover
gets forward and drives to cover, no run this time
waits for the turn and punches it to the on side
comes down the track and then at the last minute checks his shot, drives to the off side, well played
high full toss but Shakib was down the track, however it appeared over the waist, slashes it to third man
plays a front foot square cut and point slides and cuts it off and deflects it to cover point
moves across his stumps for an attempted paddle to fine leg, has to change his stroke, tucks it to the on side
tries to squeeze this past the bowler but Irfan stops it
charges down the track again and it's another high full toss, slices it square on the off side
forces it down to cover for a single
Ashwin makes the mistake of dropping it short and Shakib rubs it in by rocking back and slamming it over deep square leg, Shakib giving Bangladesh a lot of hope
goes back at the crease and forces it to the on side, this one skids through
clips it with the turn and works it behind square on the on side, runs the second as well
tucked away behind square again but only a single this time
Shakib makes a lot of room and slaps it to long-off
close call for Nasir as he tries to cut and misses, the skidder from Ashwin
good inswinging yorker thuds the base of the pads but wide of the leg stump
reads the slower delivery and he works his wrists and clips it to the on side
looks to play the pull but gets an inside edge to the body, the ball rolls to the off side
another high full toss but he was outside the crease, on waist height and he pulls wide of square leg and beats fine leg
makes room and fails to squeeze out a yorker outside the off stump, well bowled
this is getting tighter! Short and wide outside off and he rides the bounce and slashes it over backward point and the ball runs to the boundary well wide of the fielder
makes room and chops it down to the off side for a single
waits for the turn and cuts wide of cover point
gets on his knee and slogs and Praveen does well to run from long-on to cut it off
chops it wide of point
slides that wide down the leg side

Tough call for the umpire! Ashwin gets some sharp turn that beats the left-hander, Shakib was a long way forward, Dhoni was very confident, and I think Shakib was a touch unlucky here! The benefit of the doubt should have gone to the batsman, a part of his boot was on the line but one angle suggested a part of it was behind the crease when the bail was off the groove, Bangladesh have to move on now
works it behind point for a single
stays back and chops it to the off side
he gets forward and drills it down the track
tucked close to the pads and there;s a stifled appeal
eases the pressure! He drops it a fraction short and he swivels and thumps it past midwicket, beats the sweeper at the deep
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
forces it to the on side
drills it down to long-on
shuffles and clips it to short fine leg
pushes it down to long-on again, at least the singles are coming
goes back and cuts against the turn towards point
shuffles and clips it with the turn to square leg
clipped to square leg again, Bangladesh are keeping the scoreboard moving
cannot push it past the bowler
shuffles and clips it to the leg side
chips down the track and lofts inside out down to deep cover
the captain shows the way! Chips down the track and lofts over extra cover, placed it really well and had enough beat the sweeper
clips it in front of midwicket
gets beside the line and chops it to the off side for a single
drops it short and he swivels and pulls in the air over square leg, Raina cut it off
squirts out a full delivery wide of the bowler
Nasir chases a wide delivery and the ball swirls towards third man, lands between two fielders but they really should have taken teo
an audacious shot and Irfan can't believe it! Rahim gets on his knee and slogs him behind square on the on side, struck it cleanly and the ball raced to deep backward square leg
good yorker, he made room and Irfan followed the batsman, he managed to squeeze it out to the on side
Rahim squeezes out an inswinging yorker to the on side
well bowled again, he managed to dig it out to the on side
makes room and thumps it down to extra cover for a quick single, the fielder didn't throw
this is excellent stuff from Praveen, he saw the batsman making room, fired a yorker wide of the leg stump and he failed to dig it out
another dot ball! Nasir makes room and he fails to dig out a yorker outside the off stump
full toss and he swings at it and fortunately for the batsman it lands in front of long-on, that's his fifty as well
yorker on the off stump and he drills it down towards long-off
Irfan misdirects the full toss wide outside the off stump, too wide for the batsman to chase that
the timing was the difference! Irfan pitches it up on the leg stump and a nonchalant flick by Rahim was good enough to carry it over deep square leg
that's gone miles! Irfan comes round the wicket and bowls a friendly full toss and Mushfiqur moves across and clubs it high over deep midwicket
he bowls a length ball outside off and he swivels and pulls it to deep midwicket
pulled away and there's no midwicket, they pick up the second run and there's a direct hit and he grounded his bat by a long way, the 3rd umpire takes a look
some respite for Irfan as Nasir swishes and misses, he was aiming to slam that over cover
it's a waist high no-ball! Mushfiqur was down the track and slices it over cover point, the din gets louder at Mirpur
see you later! Awesome shot by Mushfiqur, length ball on the off stump and he gets under the bounce and carts it high over wide long-on
makes room and digs out a full delivery to long-on
slower ball, he makes room and pulls this one to deep midwicket
full toss and he just about clears the circle, the ball drops short of long-on
tries to finish it in one shot, down the track, swing and a miss, the slower ball, just sneaks past the off stump
full toss outside the off stump and it sped off the bat but Kohli swoops to to his left and stops it

they've done it! Bangladesh have upstaged India here, full toss outside the off stump and Mahmudullah smotes it past mid-off wild scenes as several green shirts come running out of the dressing room and congratulate their captain who is now well and truly mobbed. Take a bow Mushfiqur and Bangladesh! This win will be cherished
